publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-963 Dorothy-Grace Elder: Potential Bankruptcy of Glasgow Rape Crisis Centre-That the Parliament deplores and denounces as disgraceful the action of boxing promoter Frank Warren in attempting to demand £10,000 court costs from Glasgow Rape Crisis Centre, an organisation already starved of funds which could have its work with raped women endangered through the actions of a man who is promoting a fight for a millionaire rapist; supports the principled stand of Glasgow Rape Crisis Centre, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to support it in every possible way.
S1M-963 Potential Bankruptcy of Glasgow Rape Crisis Centre (lodged on 6 June 2000) Shona Robison*
S1M-963 Potential Bankruptcy of Glasgow Rape Crisis Centre (lodged on 6 June 2000) Tommy Sheridan*, Alex Neil*

S1M-963 Dorothy-Grace Elder: Potential Bankruptcy of Glasgow Rape Crisis Centre-That the Parliament deplores and denounces as disgraceful the action of boxing promoter Frank Warren in attempting to demand £10,000 court costs from Glasgow Rape Crisis Centre, an organisation already starved of funds which could have its work with raped women endangered through the actions of a man who is promoting a fight for a millionaire rapist; supports the principled stand of Glasgow Rape Crisis Centre, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to support it in every possible way. Supported by: Shona Robison, Tommy Sheridan, Alex Neil, Robin Harper*
S1M-963 Potential Bankruptcy of Glasgow Rape Crisis Centre (lodged on 6 June 2000) Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Andrew Wilson*
S1M-963 Potential Bankruptcy of Glasgow Rape Crisis Centre (lodged on 6 June 2000) Donald Gorrie*, Michael Russell*

S1M-963 Dorothy-Grace Elder: Potential Bankruptcy of Glasgow Rape Crisis Centre—That the Parliament deplores and denounces as disgraceful the action of boxing promoter Frank Warren in attempting to demand £10,000 court costs from Glasgow Rape Crisis Centre, an organisation already starved of funds which could have its work with raped women endangered through the actions of a man who is promoting a fight for a millionaire rapist; supports the principled stand of Glasgow Rape Crisis Centre, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to support it in every possible way. Supported by: Shona Robison, Tommy Sheridan, Alex Neil, Robin Harper, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Andrew Wilson, Donald Gorrie, Michael Russell
S1M-963 Potential Bankruptcy of Glasgow Rape Crisis Centre (lodged on 6 June 2000) Fiona McLeod*
S1M-963 Potential Bankruptcy of Glasgow Rape Crisis Centre (lodged on 6 June 2000) Mr Adam Ingram*, Tricia Marwick*, Mr Gil Paterson*

Supported by: Shona Robison, Tommy Sheridan, Alex Neil, Robin Harper, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Andrew Wilson, Donald Gorrie, Michael Russell, Fiona McLeod, Mr Adam Ingram, Tricia Marwick, Mr Gil Paterson
